name: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis with Secondary Capillary Leak Syndrome
chief_complaint: Mom says: 'He's coughing up blood and his whole body is swelling up!'
prognosis: Guarded; depends on early recognition and aggressive treatment. May progress to respiratory failure.
description: A rare condition characterized by recurrent alveolar hemorrhage leading to pulmonary hemosiderosis, complicated by systemic capillary leak causing profound edema. Pathophysiology involves autoimmune-mediated damage to pulmonary capillaries with secondary systemic vascular permeability.
multiple_choice: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis with Secondary Capillary Leak Syndrome
